QtPauseAnimation Class Reference
[QtCore module]

The QtPauseAnimation class provides a pause for QtSequentialAnimationGroup. More...

 #include <QtPauseAnimation>

This class is under development and is subject to change.

Detailed Description

The QtPauseAnimation class provides a pause for QtSequentialAnimationGroup.

Property Documentation

duration : int

This property holds the duration of the pause.

The duration of the pause. The duration should not be negative.

Access functions:

  • virtual int duration () const
  • void setDuration ( int msecs )

Member Function Documentation

QtPauseAnimation::QtPauseAnimation ( QObject * parent = 0 )

Constructs a QtPauseAnimation. parent is passed to QObject's constructor. The default duration is 0.

QtPauseAnimation::QtPauseAnimation ( int msecs, QObject * parent = 0 )

Constructs a QtPauseAnimation. msecs is the duration of the pause. parent is passed to QObject's constructor.

QtPauseAnimation::~QtPauseAnimation ()

Destroys the pause animation.
